price: چا ته چې وغواړي عذابوي يې او چا ته چې وغواړي رحم پرې كوي او تاسي به همغه ته ورګرځول كېږئ.
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayarḥamu man yashāu wa-ilayhi tuq'labūna
